title: Intensive Short-Term Course on Computer-Based Material Design and Development for Language Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and experience in language education
context.additional_context: IT training for in-service language teachers conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: They can design computer-based learning materials for language education purposes as smartphone-based tools.
They can create interactive language learning content using simple programming tools (e.g., block coding).
They can apply IT education theories in conjunction with Second Language Acquisition (SLA) theories when developing educational materials.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
